full_summary:
================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**
--------------------------------

**Title**
--------

**Riding Mowers**
----------------

**Reference Number**
-------------------

W8476-246760/A

**Submission Deadline**
----------------------

September 21, 2023, 14:00:00 Eastern Time

**Synopsis**
------------

The Department of National Defence invites eligible suppliers to submit bids for the supply of Riding Mowers and related items. This solicitation is part of Supply Arrangement E60HS-18MOWR for Configuration 1A, 2A, 4A. The Contractor is expected to deliver quantities of seven (7) Riding Mowers within 180 days of receiving the purchase order.

**Requirements and Solicitation Details**
----------------------------------------

*   Suppliers must hold a current Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement E60HS-18MOWR/B.
*   The Solicitation documents are subject to mandatory publication on CanadaBuys for a period of fifteen (15) calendar days.
*   Suppliers are expected to submit their bids in either English or French.

**Eligibility and Trade Agreements**
-----------------------------------

*   The Solicitation is open to suppliers who hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the listed trade agreements:
    *   The Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
    *   The Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   The Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   The Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   The Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   The World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   The Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   The Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   The Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
    *   The Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contact Information**
-----------------------

*   For any inquiries, please contact:
    *   Name: Dong Le
    *   Email: [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: (999) 999-9999

**Address**
----------

101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Canada
